entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
